#include <stdio.h>

main()
{
int fall, n, k, m, c, i, s, e, v, w, r[50100];
long long l;

for(scanf("%d",&fall); fall--; printf("%d %lld\n",c,l))
	{
	for(i=!scanf("%d %d %d",&n,&k,&m); i<m; scanf("%d",&r[i++]));
	for(i=c=l=!(s=1),e=k; i<m&&r[i]<=k; i++);
	if(i<m)
		{
		v=s;
		w=e;
		s=e=r[i];
		}
	while(i<m)
		{
		for(;i<m&&e>=r[i]&&r[i]>=s; i++);
		if(i<m&&r[i]<s&&r[i]+k-1>=e)
			s=r[i];
		else if(i<m&&r[i]>e&&s+k-1>=r[i])
			e=r[i];
		else
			{
			if(abs(s-v)<abs(e-w))
				{
				l+=abs(s-v);
				w=(v=s)+k-1;
				}
			else
				{
				l+=abs(e-w);
				v=(w=e)-k+1;
				}
			s=(i<m)?(e=r[i]):s;
			c++;
			}
		}
	}
return 0;
}
